name: Sky Stompers
description:
Sky Stompers!

>Crush your friends(literally) ,in this 1v1 arena platformer!

>First one to 0 lives loses!

>With multiple maps, the fun is endless!

>But beware! Stand on a cloud for too long and you'll fall!

Controls:

  • Player 1(pink guy)- WASD
  • Player 2 (green guy)- IJKL
  • Stomp on your friends with S or K!
  • Esc to pause game

LAN and Online Multiplayer coming soon, with many more maps!
